txt.en: The Champion has a number of skills at their disposal, but perhaps none more deadly than their remorseless nature.
The Blade-storm is considered one of the most exacting and difficult manoeuvres a Champion can execute, it is worth learning it well.
Land critical blows with Blade-storm, Remorseless Strike or Raging Blade
You have discovered a particular flow and momentum to battle that allows you to execute the Blade-storm with considerably less effort.
